lead_paragraph: THOMAS--Evelyn H.,beloved wife of Bernard Thomas, beloved mother of Ira, John, and Ruth, and beloved grandmother of Laura. She lit up the lives of all who knew her and loved her. Memorial service to be held at Eden Memorial Chapels in Fort Lee, NJ. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  THOMAS, EVELYN H.
